articles.title: 'Romero's here playing volleyball': Fans baffled at how defender avoided a RED CARD vs Holland - Daily Mail
articles.description: Nahuel Molina put the South American side ahead in the first half, thanks to a stupendous assist from Lionel Messi, but Holland bounced back, pumping several long balls into Argentina's half.
articles.content:
Cristian Romero 'should have been sent off' during Argentina's World Cup quarter-final match against Holland for 'playing volleyball', according to football fans on Twitter.
